thoughtText: Step Aside COFFEE This is a Job for ALCOHOL! I have a big job tomorrow!!!

comments.commentText: Everyone knows that debugging is twice as hard as writing a program in the first place. So if you're as clever as you can be thne you def need a drink!
comments.author: SelinaKyle

thoughtText: Not to get technical, But according to chemistry ALCOHOL is a solution & I need a solution today!
Everybody’s got to believe in something. I believe I’ll have another beer because today was unbelievably bad
Either give me more wine or leave me alone, I've had enough customer interaction today.

comments.commentText: I'm not that great with customers either; I'm just a good programmer with great habits.
comments.author: BarryAllen

thoughtText: I never laugh until I’ve had my coffee & I sure could use a double shot (of espresso) today!

comments.commentText: Love it that you are talking about coffee shots rather than liquor shots!!
comments.author: NatashaRomanoff

thoughtText: Like my granny used to say, 'Nothing lasts forever so live it up, drink it down, laugh it off'. Missing her today..
My doctor told me to watch my drinking, so I’m off to find a bar with a mirror.

comments.commentText: I see what you did there ;)
comments.author: LokiLaufeyson

thoughtText: I can’t fully espresso my excitement! It was the best day ever! I need a drink to match my mood
They said I could be anything, so I decided I wanted to be caffeinated! 14 shots ought to do it!!
you know what they say-Three shots a day keeps the doctor away!

comments.commentText: I know that its actually a fact!
comments.author: ThorOdinson
